website_summaries.verdict: Very inexpensive glove deodorizers with a thick design that keeps them stuck inside the gloves.
pros: Has a cedar scent, as they use some actual cedar chips to provide the deodorizing properties
Thick design means they should fit tightly in all sorts of glove styles
Carries a very low price point
cons: Smaller overall size than some other deodorizing pads, so not as effective on heavy odors

customer_reviews.title: Sort of like when u spray air freashner in a stinky bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt work. Too small to effectively help n fit in gloves n doesnt obsorb moisture at all. The cedar smell just attaches itself on wet sweat smell n spreads it out more. Sort of like when u spray air freashner in a stinky bathroom. Just dont waste ur $ or time
customer_reviews.author: Emma D

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I like what these are used for but they're too small! I wish they were a lot bigger to fill out my boxing gloves. My gloves are 8oz and small so I was disappointed in the size of these.
customer_reviews.author: BFD Piper

customer_reviews.title: ... wayyyy smaller than I thought and they dont snell like anything. It says that it will have your ...
customer_reviews.text: They are wayyyy smaller than I thought and they dont snell like anything. It says that it will have your gloves smelling fresh. It can help the moisture a little, but defianatly doesnt help with smell or anything because it has no smell
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure how well these work. I bought another brand that works better and has longer handles.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Lige

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Great item, I train 3 times a week. Constant mitt work and sparring sessions, my gloves are soaked. This item dries out my gloves and prevents mildew build-up and odors.
customer_reviews.author: JOJO B. ISRAEL

customer_reviews.title: Like!
customer_reviews.text: I was leary as to if these would actually work. I felt they were on the small side at first. I usually leave my gloves sitting open on an upside down 1" pvc pipe in my garage. But these deodorizers actually do work well and I can keep my gloves in my car or in my bag! And not hanging above the garage cans in the garage!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Smells wayyyyy better than sweat! Does their job for sure
customer_reviews.text: If you train, you will find the benefits of the deodorizing glove dogs right away!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie and Jolanda

customer_reviews.title: Great Find for the Boxing Gloves or other work gloves.
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift for Christmas to a friend who is taking boxing course and has to take the gloves home everyday. She loved her gift and I paired with another gym bag odor eliminator .
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Maybe a Placebo?
customer_reviews.text: They don't really smell like anything and I haven't noticed much difference in smell decrease, but still just stick them in for the moisture absorption.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT help with smell
customer_reviews.text: These do NOT help to deodorize boxing gloves and are completely ineffective.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must Have
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to get these stinky gloves smelling and feeling brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Melvin Robertson Jr

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They suit my need but it's way smaller than I thought. They don't cover the wrist to forearm range.
customer_reviews.author: Sang-Cheol Lee

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t help with boxing glove smell
customer_reviews.text: This really didn’t do anything to mitigate the stench inside my boxing gloves. I guess it’s useful for absorbing moisture post-workout, but for help with the scent you are better off using a natural powder.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not the best, but good for the price. Definitely better than not doing anything for your gloves after a work out!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: I use these for my quick wraps and they work ...
customer_reviews.text: I use these for my quick wraps and they work well. You still have to wash your wraps regularly though.
customer_reviews.author: Float Therapy Spa

customer_reviews.title: no scent
customer_reviews.text: doesn't deodorize and has no scent at all, might be a really old product and lost its ability to deodorize.
customer_reviews.author: gage

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: They work as advertised. I use my gloves almost daily and put these in right after.
customer_reviews.author: James Schulte

customer_reviews.text: Great product. Doesn't have an odor which is what I prefer for my gloves. I find it dries out and find it obvious when it's time to replace with a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: They are awesome!! I bought as a gift for my ...
customer_reviews.text: They are awesome!! I bought as a gift for my boyfriend's boxing gloves but then I ended buying another one for me!
customer_reviews.author: Lizzethe Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as scented as precious glove deodorizer I’ve purchased You can hardly tell it is scented.
customer_reviews.author: Slvincent

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent glove deodorizes! My gloves stay fresh and stink-free after every use.
customer_reviews.author: Chexpeare

customer_reviews.title: Good job Everlast!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to pull the sweat right out of my gloves. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Spratt

customer_reviews.title: ) Worth buying specially if you don't like using smelly gloves
customer_reviews.text: I expected it to be a little bigger but it is ok since it does the job of keeping my gloves free from unwanted odors :) Worth buying specially if you don't like using smelly gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Karmina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Keeps gloves dry also keeps the smell away would recommend
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: dont waste your money they do not deodorizer AT ALL
customer_reviews.author: asia D.

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Definitely cuts the odor of my gloves! About as close as you can get to clean when the gloves can’t be washed
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very weak compared to the Meister's doesn't make a significant difference as competitor products do.
customer_reviews.author: Bob B

customer_reviews.title: Good product overall
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good. It helps to remove humidity from the gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Danae Cossette

customer_reviews.title: Only used 2x so far but does not leave a ...
customer_reviews.text: Only used 2x so far but does not leave a stink in my gloves. Can’t comment on drying time but no smell so that’s all I care about.
customer_reviews.author: The Shadow

product_meta.title: Everlast P00000666 Everfresh Glove Deodorizers
product_meta.description: The preeminent brand in boxing since 1910, Everlast is the world’s leading manufacturer, marketer and licensor of boxing, MMA and fitness equipment. Built on a brand heritage of strength, dedication, individuality and authenticity, Everlast is a necessary part of the lives of countless champions.
feature_bullets: Gear that won't quit. Power, protection, or the perfect balance, we have you covered.
Everlast is the brand of choice for generations of world champion professional athletes
Based in Manhattan, Everlast’s products are sold across more than 75 countries and 6 continents
Timeless icon of boxing style with laser etched detailing and authentic Everlast logo
Personalized gear for you. We have the tools, you have the talent
